tree_elements.text: “I’ve seen eight Broadway shows in the last two years. (Including Hamilton with the original cast)!”

“I received my Bachelors Degree in Health and Physical education from Montclair State University, GO RED HAWKS! I love all sports and my favorite teams are the Philadelphia Eagles, Philadelphia 76ers and New York Yankees.”
“I am a member of Vesper Boat Club on Boathouse Row in Philadelphia and am training for the Head of Charles Regatta in Boston on October 20.”
“I enjoy running and skateboarding outside of music. They’re my favorite hobbies.”
“I have studied the violin for the past 32 years and have participated in many orchestras, chamber groups, and solo performances.”
“I went to the World Cup when Brazil hosted in 2014.”
“I love the beach and warm weather. I’ve lived in New Jersey my whole life but I have visited Florida more times than I have visited New York.”
“I have spent my summers camping and traveling within the United States and have visited nearly half of the 50 states in the last 15 years.”
